PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xC8C8C8^7**Levelling guide, notes subject to change as the new league launches.
Welcome to the Subtractem Bane Occultist Levelling guide!
This guide is designed to give players an excellent league starter comfortably and smoothly. While it's not as fast as other builds out there, it's very effecient and budget friendly. This guide is NOT a complete ACT compaign walkthrough. It is designed to take you from the beginning of the game, when it's most challenging to the endgame. Incase you do not know, the Tree section in the Path of Building has a drop down menu on the bottom left that lets you see the stages of the passive tree as you progress.
(Much thanks to notes editor extraordinaire Khaosshinobi for this spectacular rewrite - Subtractem)
-----------------------------^7^xAF6025 ^xAF6025^xD02090Act 1^7 ^xD02090-----------------------------^7^xAF6025
^7^xFFFF77^xC8C8C8^xFFFF77Vendor Search String: b-b-g|b-g-b|g-b-b|r-b-b|b-r-b|b-b-r|b-b-b|runne
^7-Gra^7b^7 ^x7070FFFreezing Pulse^7 from the first quest, and buy ^x7070FFBlight^7 from Nessa to begin levelling it up. But don't actually use ^x7070FFBlight^7, yet. Save your blue gems! -Link ^x7070FFFreezing Pulse^7 with ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 (Ditch this setup once you get ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 and ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7)
Don't level ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 too much if you notice it's uptime starts being too infrequent. *Generally level 3 is fine, but level 1 is on the safer side for uptime*
-Look for a ^xE05030Red^7+^x7070FFBlue^7+^x7070FFBlue^7 or ^x70FF70Green^7 link item to link ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 + ^x7070FFSummon Phantasm^7 + ^x7070FFAdded Lightning^7 -Look for ^x7070FFBlue^7+^x7070FFBlue^7+^x7070FFBlue^7 for ^x7070FFFrost Blink^7 (until you get ^x7070FFFlame Dash^7) + ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 + ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7
(Can do ^x7070FFStormblast mine^7 + ^x7070FFFrostbomb^7 + ^x7070FFOrb of Storms^7 if preferred over ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 w/ ^x7070FFSummon Phantasms^7 and/or ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7)
-Buy ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 from Nessa, and take the skills^x7070FF Flame Wall^7 and ^x7070FFFrostblink^7 from Tarkleigh, after travelling to the Submerged Passage -Link ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 with ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7 early. Link ^x7070FF^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7^7 with ^x7070FFAdded Lightning Damage^7 or ^x70FF70Added Cold Damage^7 based on the sockets you find
^x7070FFSummon Phantasm^7^x7070FFs^7 becomes available after collecting the Medicine Chest on the Coast. From the same quest, grab a Quicksilver flask. You'll want to craft a mod onto your quicksilver using a transmute.
Look for Iron Rings. you can vendor an Iron Rings + a^x7070FF Blue^7 gem, like ^x7070FFFireball^7 or ^x7070FFFreezing Pulse^7, for a Sapphire Ring if needing frost resist for Merveil or future wand craft!
-Grab ^x70FF70Void Manipulation^7, when you get to the prison. Socket it where possible to level it up, but don't prioritize this over your skills or red sockets for auras later.
For Brutus, use ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 to hold aggro and keep your distance and just play safe.
-Grab ^x7070FFFlame Dash^7, ^xE05030Vitality^7, and ^x7070FFClarity^7 after defeating Brutus
Prioritise getting ^xE05030Vitality^7, it increases your survivability dramatically Replace ^x7070FFFrost Blink^7 with ^x7070FFFlame Dash^7, make sure you click on ^x7070FFFlame Dash^7 on your bar and turn on "always attack without moving" so it casts no matter where your cursor is. If you have strength issues with ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 and/or ^xE05030Vitality^7, look for Heavy Belts, they give + Strength
-Grab ^x7070FFEssence Drain^7 when getting to Merveil's Lair to level it asap. Immediately craft the wand below. ^xFFFF77 DISCLAIMER: If you are using this craft on your currently equipped wands it will make the item level requirement level 14!!^7^7^xD02090 ^7-----------------^7 ^x7070FFMagic Wand^7 (Blue quality) + ^x7070FFMagic^7 (Blue Quality) ^x7070FFRuby/Topaz/Sapphire Ring^7 + Orb of Alteration -----------------
If you don't have ^x7070FFmagic^7 qualities, you can use Orbs of Transmutations to change them into ^x7070FFmagic^7 quality items. If you have spare red gems and Iron rings, you can do the same craft as earlier to get a ruby ring for this craft. Only worry about the ruby craft if you already have equipped Sapphire Rings!
Craft missing cold res on gear with Transmutes before going into Merveil's Caverns
-----------------------------^7^xAF6025 ^xAF6025^xD02090Act 2 -----------------------------^7^7 We don't really use any of the gems here, Except for ^x7070FFControlled Destruction^7, later.
-Kill all bandits for maximum skill points. -Socket ^x7070FFControlled Destruction^7 to ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7 and ^xE05030Flame Totem^7 if you can get the links.
IT'S VERY IMPORTANT TO START LOOKING FOR FUTURE GEAR LINKS! Check vendors often. Since the build really shines when we are able to combine ^x7070FFBane^7 + ^x7070FFBlight^7 + ^x7070FFEssence Drain^7 we want them all 3-4 linked asap. All of these skills will want ^x70FF70G^7 + ^x7070FFB^7 + ^x7070FFB^7 +^x7070FF B^7 link initially.
-----------------------------^7^xAF6025 ^xAF6025^xD02090Act 3 ------------------------------^7^7
^xFFFF77Vendor Search String: g-b-b-b|b-g-b-b|b-b-g-b|b-b-b-g|g-g-b-b|g-b-g-g|g-b-b-g|b-g-g-b|b-g-b-g|b-g-b-g|b-b-g-g
^7-Do the quest "Lost in Love" (find Tolman in the Crematorium) then buy gems from Clarissa. At level 24 you will swap out ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 and^x7070FF Flame Wall^7 entirely and commit to pure Chaos now. Funny enough the build is essentially complete. It's just a matter of putting the rest of the pieces together towards the end product.
Whenever 5 Links start showing up toss in^x7070FF^7 any other damage link.
You will be aiming for something like this: ^x7070FFBane^7 + ^x7070FFDespair^7 + ^x70FF70Temporal Chains^7 + ^xD02090Any Damage Link^7 ^x7070FFBlight^7 +^x7070FF Essence Drain^7 +^xD02090 Any Damage Link^7 + ^xD02090Any Damage Link^7
The beauty of this build is that we can use nearly any spell/chaos damage support link to its fullest. This means we can be VERY flexible with colors. Valid Damage Links include (but are not limited to): ^x7070FFControlled Destruction^7 ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 ^x70FF70Void Manipulation^7 ^x7070FFEfficacy^7^x70FF70 Swift Affliction ^xE05030Cruelty^7 (for Essence Drain only) ^xE05030Lifetap^7
-After you do Victario's Secrets quest (the busts in the sewer) you can respec the Fire Walker points towards more Chaos points. (The fire passive points above the starting area)
-At level 30-ish do Lab. Just keep ^x7070FFBane^7 + ^x7070FFEssence Drain ^7on Izaro and walk around the edge of the arena, it's very safe and easy. I found taking Profane Bloom first was the biggest boost to clear and comfort.
The future points I go into Void Beacon -> Withering Presence and then take Malediction last.
Some folks don't enjoy the "+ 1 Chaos gems, lose 10% life on cast" mastery as it does require us to hit our life flask a lot to top off early on so feel free to skip if you don't want to use it.
-----------------------------^7^xAF6025 ^xAF6025^xAF6025^xD02090Act 4-10 -------------------------------^7^7^7 The build is really 80% put together now. Follow the skill trees in the PoB, do the Labs when available (Act 7 for Cruel, Act 10 for Merc) and keep a close eye on your life and res.
Keep a lookout for a ^x7070FFVaal Blight^7 in Vaal side areas (or trade one from a friend that finds one) just so you can deal with getting overwhelmed in higher density areas.
The beauty of this configuration is that very little changes in play style from Act 3 onwards and you should be very comfortable playing it by the time you hit maps.
^xFFFF77Eventually you'll want to snag some +1 Chaos Skill gems wands. The easiest way to do this is make a new level 2 character and buy them in Act 1. Alteration + Aug until you hit it. You likely wont have this currency early but in the later acts you should be able to go back and get some which will help a ton.^7
------------------------------
Better Trading Extension League Start Item Search Import this string exactly for my early league searches!

If you have any questions or concerns regarding the build, never feel hesistated to ask question on Twitch at https://www.twitch.tv/subtractem , or the discord! (Discord link found on the Twitch Channel)
Cheers!
